config.description:
Cerbos config file contents.
Some server settings like server.httpListenAddr, server.grpcListenAddr, server.tls will be overwritten by the chart based on values provided above.
config.title: config

grpcPort.description: Port to expose the gRPC service on.
grpcPort.title: grpcPort

httpPort.description: Port to expose the http service on.
httpPort.title: httpPort

logLevel.description: Cerbos log level. Valid values are DEBUG, INFO, WARN and ERROR
logLevel.title: logLevel

prometheusPodAnnotationsEnabled.description: Add Prometheus service discovery annotations to the pod.
prometheusPodAnnotationsEnabled.title: prometheusPodAnnotationsEnabled

tlsSecretName.description:
Secret containing the TLS certificate.
Leave empty to disable TLS.
The secret must contain the following keys:
 - tls.crt: Required. Certificate file contents.
 - tls.key: Required. Private key for the certificate.
 - ca.crt: Optional. CA certificate to add to the trust pool.
tlsSecretName.title: tlsSecretName

certManager.description:
Spec of the cert-manager certificate to create for the Cerbos deployment.
If certSpec is not empty, a cert-manager.io/v1/Certificate resource will be created with its spec populated with values from certSpec.
The certSpec value must be a valid Certificate spec. This Helm chart does not provide any defaults or inject any values into it.
If cerbos.tlsSecretName is defined, it takes precedence over the generated certificate.
certManager.title: certManager

commonLabels.description: Common labels to add to the resources. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/common-definitions/object-meta/#ObjectMeta.
commonLabels.title: commonLabels

deployment.description: Annotations to add to the deployment. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/common-definitions/object-meta/#ObjectMeta.
deployment.title: deployment

env.description: Environment variables to add to the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#environment-variables.
env.title: env

envFrom.description: Source environment variables from config maps or secrets. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#environment-variables.
envFrom.title: envFrom

global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

digest.description: Image digest to use. Takes precedence over tag if specified.
digest.title: digest

repository.description: Container image name without the tag.
repository.title: repository

tag.description: Image tag to use. Defaults to the chart appVersion.
tag.title: tag

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets to use if pulling the image from a private container registry. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#containers.
imagePullSecrets.title: imagePullSecrets

initContainers.description: Init containers to inject into the deployment. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#containers.
initContainers.title: initContainers

nodeSelector.description: Node selector for the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#scheduling.
nodeSelector.title: nodeSelector

podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/common-definitions/object-meta/#ObjectMeta.
podAnnotations.title: podAnnotations

podLabels.description: Labels to add to the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/common-definitions/object-meta/#ObjectMeta.
podLabels.title: podLabels

podSecurityContext.description: Security context for the whole pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#security-context-1.
podSecurityContext.title: podSecurityContext

priorityClassName.description: PriorityClassName to set on deployed pods
priorityClassName.title: priorityClassName

replicaCount.description: Number of Cerbos pods to run
replicaCount.title: replicaCount

resources.description: Resource limits for the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#resources.
resources.title: resources

securityContext.description: Security context for the Cerbos container. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#security-context-1.
securityContext.title: securityContext

grpcNodePort.description: gRPC node port (if service type is NodePort)
grpcNodePort.title: grpcNodePort

httpNodePort.description: HTTP node port (if service type is NodePort)
httpNodePort.title: httpNodePort

internalTrafficPolicy.description: Set the internalTrafficPolicy. If this is unset and .Values.type is set to daemonset, this will default to "Local"
internalTrafficPolicy.title: internalTrafficPolicy

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/common-definitions/object-meta/#ObjectMeta.
annotations.title: annotations

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created.
create.title: create

name.description:
The name of the service account to use.
If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template
name.title: name

type.description: Kubernetes workload type to use. Valid values are `deployment` or `daemonset`.
type.title: type

volumeMounts.description: Volume mounts to add to the Cerbos container. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#volumes-1.
volumeMounts.title: volumeMounts

volumes.description: Volumes to add to the pod. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/kubernetes-api/workload-resources/pod-v1/#volumes.
volumes.title: volumes
